: nil paha salu palanda siti nabo kumariyage nil salu basa yana hiru ge la raktha warnayen hada watuni.epamanak nowe hiru wata siti aarakshakayan bandu sudu wala wal winiwida gos sanda rajiniya ge samprapthiyata sudanam wiya.hiru kumaru thama karyayan awasan kara nisala sayure gili nidannata sarasena ee horawe niwi thibunu tharu mal ekineka pudinnata wiya
wayo dhathuwa da saddharma anthardhanaya nokarayi.
ehema wunoth wenne raj somadewayan ihatha di pawasu andamata ‘maharagama handiye kunu damima nathara kala aakarayata‘ ho ee 76 dena hada ganima.
epamanak nowa eewa sapeksha washayen ganna pruthagjanayaku ese karanne da tharkayen ha buddhiyeni.
“ape rate samupakara wyaparaya winasha wi giye deshapalana balapam wadi wima nisayi.
pinidi ehema kiwwama mama mage ganama hithuwa.
